value.title: How Parameters work with the Power BI Paginated Visual
value.excerpt: Parameters for the Power BI Paginated visual can give you a lot of flexibility. Adam walks you through how to set up the parameters and breaks down what is actually happening with the values.  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EZifdFfjTNg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How we optimize Power Query and Power BI Dataflows
value.excerpt: Let's go into Adam's mind as he optimizes Power Query to make some Power BI Dataflows run faster to avoid resource usage. The result is INSANE AMAZING!  Power Query M function reference https://docs.microsoft.com/powerquery-m/power-query-m-function-reference  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CajQjq70Kpg" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground (2021)
value.excerpt: Want to try things out with Power BI Embedded? Want to explore the JavaScript API? Try embedding with your own report? Then you need to check out the INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground! Amit Shuster walks us through the revamp.  Blog Announcement: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/announcing-the-new-power-bi-embedded-analytics-playground-preview/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5ikWESY4sHc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Inside Power Query reference queries for Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: Chris Webb joins Patrick to look at what happens when you use reference queries for Power Query. This applies to both Power BI and Excel. Chris also looks at how change the behavior to make things a bit faster.  Data Privacy Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2018/12/27/data-privacy-settings-data-refresh-performance-power-bi-excel/

value.title: Intro to aggregates in T-SQL
value.excerpt: Getting started with T-SQL? Patrick looks at using aggregate functions within your statements to help get the right results. If you are just starting with T-SQL in either Azure SQL Database or Azure Synapse Analytics, this is for you!  Transact-SQL Reference (Database Engine) https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/t-sql/language-reference?view=sql-server-ver16

value.title: Introducing Power BI Premium Per User (Preview)
value.excerpt: Are you curious what Power BI Premium Per User is all about? Adam walks you through how to get it and what it means from a user experience. Take advantage of Power BI Premium features without the Premium capacity price!  Announcement Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-premium-per-user-public-preview-now-available/

value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???
value.excerpt: How do you know if a parameter was filtered in your Power BI Paginated Reports? Was a slicer used in the Power BI report that is using the Paginated visual? Adam shows you a way you can find out!  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Is it a KNOWN ISSUE in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Hitting issues with Power BI can be frustrating. Having to call support can be even more frustrating! What if there was a way to see if it was a known issue in Power BI??? value.title: Parameters and Templates with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows a way you can use parameters and templates, with Power BI Desktop, to provide prompts for your connection's server and database properties.   This is great for when you are creating a report, and need to share it with a customer that may have a different name for the server

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power BI Walkthrough: Analysis Services Live Connect
value.excerpt: Adam walks through how to setup a live connection to Analysis Services, or Azure Analysis Services, in Power BI Desktop. This also involves getting things working with the On-Premises Data Gateway.  What is a gateway - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WJ5Y4FjkWZw Authentication with AS Live Connections

value.title: Power Query! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand Power Query M syntax? Power Query can be fun, but also can turn complicated. Learning Power Query can make Power BI and Excel very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Concept: Roche's Maxim https://ssbipolar.com/2021/05/31/roches-maxim/
